publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2438.1 Nicola Sturgeon: Renewing Mental Health Law—As an amendment to motion (S1M-2438) in the name of Susan Deacon, insert at end "and also supports the view expressed in the Millan Committee’s report that the aspirations underlying its recommendations for new mental health law will not be met unless services and facilities are adequate to meet the demands placed on them." Supported by: Shona Robison*
